BoatConfig

extendable interface for creating, parsing and saving boat configs

Imports

../../../bdd, captainsLogUtils

Types

BoatConfig = ref object of RootObj
  use*: string               ## \
                             ## file / dir / remote uri pointing to a manifest.nim.ini
base type for all boat configs   Source   Edit
